title: 16 Perch land for sale in Polgasowita
details:
16.3 perch residential land for sale in Polgasowita .Just 800 m to Polgasowita junction ( horana colombo 120bus Route ) . 1.2 Km to Southern expressway Kahathuduwa interchange. 1Km to wethara hospital
